ORDER
MOTION TO APPEAR VIA ZOOM filed by GILLILAND BRITTANY MICHELLE is
hereby GRANTED.
Counsel to provide the Court with each virtual witness's email address for the ZOOM
link.
At the scheduled start time, the Virtual Witness(es) should be located in a quiet area
free from distractions and with reliable internet connection. No recording of the
hearing is permitted, either by virtual or in-person attendee(s).
DONE this 6thday of June, 2025.
/s/ KEVIN HALL
CIRCUIT JUDGE
